thread.title: Texas officer killed, suspect in custody

title: Texas officer killed, suspect in custody
text:
Texas officer killed, suspect in custody Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 00:53 
Police say a Texas officer was shot and killed after responding to a disturbance call at an apartment complex. The suspect was taken into custody following a standoff. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Police say a Texas officer was shot and killed after responding to a disturbance call at an apartment complex. The suspect was taken into custody following a standoff. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2skeEJP
